Frequency once per hour

You issue a cloud of your fragrance like a full-body sneezeâ€”but one that might save your life as the powerful perfume makes your attackers' eyes sting and water. Plants and fungi are immune to this effect, but all other creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10] must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save against your class DC or spell DC (whichever is higher) with the following results.

Critical Success No effect.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled] for 1 round.

Failure The creature is dazzled and can see only 10 feet away for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] for 1 round.
